p1.storyText: You are a crow named Mx. Crow. You are flying high above the countryside. You see a farm off to the West, and your home forest off to the East.

choices.text: Fly over the farm to the West.
Fly back home to your nest in the forest.

homeEnd.storyText:
You return home to your comfy roost in the forest canopy and enjoy a hot cup of tea!

The End.

p2.storyText: You fly over the Farm and see a piece of cheese lying on the picnic table. There are no people around that you can see. The cheese looks very tasty, but you are worried there might be a person or, even worse, a CAT lurking somewhere you can't see.

choices.text: Decide it's not worth the risk and fly back to the forest.

p3.storyText: You swoop down and pluck the cheese from the table. Just as you grab hold of the cheese, the farmer's cat leaps onto the table ahead of you!

choices.text: Veer off to the left trying to avoid the cat.
Fly directly at the cat, full steam ahead!

basketEnd.storyText:
You fly directly into a picnic basket, which slams shut behind you. You are stuck until some kind human comes to open the basket. But at least the cat didn't eat you!

The End

p4.storyText: You zoom towards the cat, who is surprised by the direct approach and leaps off the table. You pull up sharply and make it over the big oak tree to a safe cruising altitude. The sun is shining, the wind is beneath your wings, and you have a beak full of cheese.

choices.text: Find somewhere nice to eat your cheese.

p5.storyText:
You find a secluded fence post in the middle of a large field full of wildflowers. You decide this will be a wonderful place to have a snack.

Just as you settle down you see Mr. Fox strolling down the path towards your fence post.

choices.text: Say, "Hello Mr. Fox! Join me for cheese."
Keep a wary eye on Mr. Fox.

shareCheese.storyText:
You hop down to the ground and Mr. Fox helps you break the cheese in half. He is very grateful to you for sharing your cheese, and he gives you a lovely ribbon for your nest.

The End

p6.storyText: Mr. Fox approaches and says, "Hello Mx. Crow! It's been so long since we've seen each other. I've missed hearing your lovely singing voice. Won't you sing me a tune before I go?"

choices.text: Sing a song for Mr. Fox.

dropCheeseEnd.storyText:
You open your beak to sing a lovely song, and your cheese comes tumbling out. Mr. Fox quickly snaps the cheese out of the air as it falls and gobbles it up!

The End

p7.storyText:
You remain silent through all of Mr. Fox's flattery. In the end, he knows you won't fall for his tricks, and he leaves you alone.

Finally able to relax in quiet, you enjoy your well-earned cheese.

The End

failure.storyText: This doesn't actually exist. You must have gotten here by accident, because you really shouldn't be here. Maybe you need to start over?
